metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16138 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
The mime module < 1.4.1, 2.0.1, 2.0.2 is vulnerable to regular expressiondenial of service when a mime lookup is performed on untrusted user input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16138` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-mime - 2.4.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-mime package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.4+dfsg-1').
